sentence: This hotel is connected with the Monterey Conference Ctr
We also had a private function in a meeting room with a catered lunch the AV was set up on time the room was fine the food was great and the staff were fantastic
This is a party hotel for conference attendees
It was so convenient being able to walk to dining and entertainment venues nearby
This is a massive conference hotel with very little charm
My family stayed for a few nights for a conference
wine tasting with dinner event live band at the brewery bar lounge etc
The restrooms near the convention rooms were clean and tidy and I frequently saw staff either entering or exiting them with cleaning supplies
It was convenient to get to the expo and to walk to the start line
If you are attending a convention in Monterey this is the place to stay because it is generally the main hotel for the event
I was here for a conference and after a long day on the conference floor I needed to catch up on email
I originally planned to stay two nights for a work conference but ended up needing to stay an extra two
The nearby convention center is under full reconstruction
A large tent has been constructed which was used for the Jazz Bash over 34 to 3616
The hate is nice but it is geared toward conventions and conferences
not too charming conference hotel in central Monterey
Despite construction of an expanded convention center this is an excellent hotel
Hope the construction is complete at the convention center
Another issue I had is I was there for the WACAC Confernece and our conference was n’t over until 4 pm but check out was at noon
The food in the hotel restaurant is for conference guest
It ’s really a large conference hotel and can seem empty when there are n’t any conferences in progress Aspects of the hotel are dated and in need of an upgrading
Crowded lobby and facilities due to convention business
And the one night we stayed there was a false fire alarm that was super loud and late at night and a Google convention which shut out the regular public from parts of the hotel

Room was average no air conditioning hot stuffy could n’t leave window open due to continuous racket from masses of seagulls well past midnight and people walking up and down staircase located outside room 481
Noisy in the hall with the convention center our room in another building very expensive for a business without charm hotel
We had to lift our luggage up by using staircase
We stayed in a room that overlooked the interior dinning atrium area
do not book based on pictures of the foyer rooms are old and nothing like it
